author: cautiousfox
title: New Member Onboarding
description: How might we make it faster and easier for new Catalyst members to take on suitable roles and responsibilities in 2022?
importance: The success of Catalyst depends on the availability of quality challenge teams, proposers, advisors, mentors and voters.
success: A well-oiled open innovation platform where people fulfill roles that are meaningful for them and that contribute to shared success.
